==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|がん|めん|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
Probably from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=かんめん'}} compound {{m|ltc|顔面|tr=*ngæn *mjien}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} traditional {{m|cmn|顏面}} and simplified {{m|cmn|颜面|tr=yánmiàn}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|h|が|んめん}}<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>
* {{ja-accent-common|n|が|んめ|ん}}<ref name="DJR"/>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[gã̠mme̞ɴ]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|がんめん|kyu=顏面}}

# a person's [[face]]
# the [[surface]] of someone's [[face]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=かんめん'|archaic}} [[flattery]], [[sycophancy]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=かんめん'|archaic}} a [[flatterer]], a [[sycophant]]
